method.name: AddImportPath
method.comment: Adds the given import path into sys.path. This action is necessary to import external modules.

method.name: Finalize
method.comment: Terminates the Python interpreter. This action is required to avoid memory leaks.

method.name: Execute
method.comment: Executes the given Python code and returns its stdout. This can range from a single line to an entire script.

method.name: LogStatusMessages
method.comment: Allows you to decide whether or not should status messages be displayed in the log console.

method.name: Reset
method.comment: Clears all objects from memory and resets the Python interpreter.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the interpreter. Note: The Python Standard Library files are installed into 'File.DirInternal' on the first run.

method.name: LogInput
method.comment: Allows you to decide whether or not should the input code be displayed in the log console.

method.name: LogOutput
method.comment: Allows you to decide whether or not should the Python output be displayed in the log console.

field.name: AboutLib
field.comment: NinjaPython 1.03 - Ninja Dynamics Compiled: 31/10/2017 @ 21:29:53 Package Name: com.ninjadynamics.ninjapython
